channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-32625] Log error message when falling back to interpreter mode
item.description:
Current:

21:45:52.787 WARN org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.Predicate: Expr codegen error and falling back to interpreter mode
+---+----+
| id|   k|
+---+----+
|  0|0.00|
|  1|1.00|
+---+----+

Excepted:
